item.description: Number of agent removed for various reasons, including maintenance

item.name: Mesos Cluster - Number of agents removed when new agents registered at the same address
Mesos Cluster - Number of agents failed due to failed health checks
Mesos Cluster - Number of agents unregistered
Mesos Cluster - Slave re-registrations
Mesos Cluster - Slave shutdown canceled
item.description: Number of cancelled agent shutdowns. This happens when the agent removal rate limit allows for an agent to reconnect and send a PONG to the master before being removed.

item.name: Mesos Cluster - Slave shutdown completed
item.description: Number of agents that failed their health check. These are agents which were not heard from despite the agent-removal rate limit, and have been removed from the master's agent registry.

item.name: Mesos Cluster - Slave shutdown scheduled
item.description: Number of agents which have failed their health check and are scheduled to be removed. They will not be immediately removed due to the Agent Removal Rate-Limit, but master/slave_shutdowns_completed will start increasing as they do get removed.

Mesos Cluster - Registry log recovered
item.description: Whether the replicated log for the registrar has caught up with the other masters in the cluster. A cluster is operational as long as a quorum of "recovered" masters is available in the cluster.
